verses.verse: <S%H835>Blessed<s%> is he who <S%H7919>considers<s%> the <S%H1800>poor.<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will <S%H4422>deliver<s%> him in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H7451>evil.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will <S%H8104>preserve<s%> <S%H2421>him,<s%> and keep him alive. He shall be <S%H833>blessed<s%> on the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and he will not <S%H5414>surrender<s%> him to the <S%H5315>will<s%> of his <S%H341>enemies.<s%>
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will <S%H5582>sustain<s%> him on his <S%H6210>sickbed,<s%> <S%H1741><s%> and <S%H2015>restore<s%> him from his <S%H6210>bed<s%> of <S%H2483>illness.<s%>
I <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3068>"Yahweh,<s%> have <S%H2603>mercy<s%> on <S%H7495>me!<s%> Heal <S%H5315>me,<s%> for I have sinned against <S%H2398>you.<s%>"
My <S%H341>enemies<s%> <S%H559>speak<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> against <S%H4191>me:<s%> "When will he die, and his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H6>perish?<s%>"

If he <S%H935>comes<s%> to <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H1696>me,<s%> he speaks <S%H7723>falsehood.<s%> His <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H6908>gathers<s%> <S%H205>iniquity<s%> to <S%H3318>itself.<s%> When he goes <S%H2351>abroad,<s%> he tells <S%H1696>it.<s%>
All who <S%H8130>hate<s%> me <S%H3907>whisper<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%> against <S%H2803>me.<s%> They imagine the worst for <S%H7451>me.<s%>
"An <S%H1100>evil<s%> <S%H1697>disease,<s%>" they <S%H3332>say,<s%> "has afflicted <S%H7901>him.<s%> Now that he lies he shall rise <S%H6965>up<s%> no <S%H3254>more.<s%>"
<S%H7965>Yes,<s%> my own familiar <S%H376>friend,<s%> in whom I <S%H982>trusted,<s%> who <S%H398>ate<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> with <S%H1431>me,<s%> has lifted up his heel against <S%H6119>me.<s%>
But <S%H3068>you,<s%> Yahweh, have <S%H2603>mercy<s%> on <S%H6965>me,<s%> and raise me up, that I may repay <S%H7999>them.<s%>
By this I <S%H3045>know<s%> that you <S%H2654>delight<s%> in <S%H341>me,<s%> because my enemy <S%H7321>doesn't<s%> triumph over me.
As for <S%H8551>me,<s%> you uphold me in my <S%H8537>integrity,<s%> and <S%H5324>set<s%> me in your <S%H6440>presence<s%> <S%H5769>forever.<s%>
<S%H1288>Blessed<s%> be <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> from <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> and to <S%H5769>everlasting!<s%> <S%H543>Amen<s%> and <S%H543>amen.<s%>
